snippet.title: SlideNGlide - Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Demo
snippet.description:
A challenging action-platformer where players navigate diverse biomes filled with unique enemies, tough platforming challenges, and intense boss fights. With tight controls and punishing difficulty, the game rewards precision, mastery, and exploration.

Developed by RBCMrRhoads
Release Date: Q1 2025

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #theforeseenarcade #steamnextfest #steamnextfestfebruary2025 #slidenglide

(Why couldn't the movement be mapped to the D-Pad instead of the analog stick?)
